Room.Name: Lorian Parkway/Darmanian Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Darmanian Way and Lorian Parkway.
Room.LongDescription: Darmanian Way runs east and west, intersecting Lorian Parkway, which runs north and south out of the intersection. Both streets are lined with various shops and facilities for just about everyone for almost any reason. On the southwest corner of the road is the Temple of Clerical Science, where clerics from all around the region come to discuss the issues involved in modern clergy.
